/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars of various colors navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
